marta_innkeeper.name: Marta
marta_innkeeper.role: Innkeeper of the Stumbling Pig tavern
marta_innkeeper.description: A stout woman in her 50s with flour-dusted apron and knowing eyes
marta_innkeeper.personality: Warm but shrewd. Knows everyone's business. Protective of regulars.

tobias_blacksmith.name: Tobias
tobias_blacksmith.description: Massive arms, burn scars, speaks few words. His hammer rings from dawn to dusk.
tobias_blacksmith.personality: Gruff, honorable, secretly crafts toys for village children

elder_morris.name: Elder Morris
elder_morris.description: Bent with age, walks with a gnarled oak staff, memory sharp as a blade
elder_morris.personality: Patient, fond of long stories, worries about the village's future

sera_stranger.name: Sera
sera_stranger.role: Mysterious traveler staying at the inn
sera_stranger.description: Cloaked figure, keeps to shadows, pays in foreign coin
sera_stranger.personality: Evasive, observant, seems to be waiting for something

captain_aldric.name: Captain Aldric
captain_aldric.role: Captain of the village guard (all 4 of them)
captain_aldric.description: Former soldier, limp in left leg, still wears his old legion insignia
captain_aldric.personality: By-the-book, haunted by past battles, takes duty seriously
